page.title: 02OUR LIFE AT HOME & SCHOOL II
page.content: DO WORK HAVE JOBS AS FOLLOW:BRICKLAYERS AND GARAGE MECHANICS 2,THE REST INCLUDE A CARPENTER,PEST CONTROL OFFICER, PLUMBER,ROOFER,RAILWAY GUARD AND WORKERS' IN THE STEELWORKS,BRITISH OXYGEN AND AN INSULATION FITTING FIRM.MANY OF OUR MOTHERS JUST WORK AT HOME BUT 16 HAVE JOBS OUTSIDE.THESE INCLUDE CASHIERS AT THE LOCAL SUPERMARKET,BARMAID,NURSING ASSISTANT,KITCHEN AND OFFICE WORKERS AND A SCRAP-IRON COLLECTOR,AS MANY FAMILIES HAVE LOW INCOME.20 CHILDREN HAVE FREE SCHOOL MEALS. HOUSEHOLDS RANGE IN SIZE FROM 13 TO 3.MOST CHILDREN HAVE 5 PEOPLE LIVING AT HOME. WE BELONG TO MANY OUTSIDE CLUBS.THOSE ATTENDING CUBS 5,BROWNIES 12,JUDO 2,AND ONE EACH FOR SWIMMING,GYM,GIRLS AND BOYS BRIGADE,RUGBY,FISHING,
